DOC.brief_summary: Determine the clinical visual outcomes following bilateral implantation of the AcrySof ReSTOR Aspheric Intraocular Lens (IOL) and to demonstrate what percentage of the subjects obtain spectacle freedom.
DOC.brief_title: Visual Performance of Bilateral AcrySof ReSTOR Aspheric +4
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed with cataracts Preexisting conditions confounding results; > 1 Diopter preoperative astigmatism
